title: some.stuff font
content:
Hi all,

Anyone know what font is used in the attached image?

Cheers
author: reboot

comments.content:
Don't think I attached the image, here it is

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130820010704im_/http:/typophile.com/files/2367945299_d3993d48de_o_3632.jpg)
[Avant-Garde Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20130820010704/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/avant-garde-gothic) using some alternates and customized (/M and /E).
